page.title: 17USE OF LEISURE-PATCHWAY EAST
page.content: We did a survey,door to door,and found that people had many different hobbies. Most popular are gardening, reading,knitting,sewing and television Others included tap dancing and wind surfing, and one woman wsa interested in motorbikes. Many people belonged to skittles clubs and others British Rail,British Aerospace and MENSA (one lady). In school,we found swimming was popular,also cubs and brownies. In our class many people had collections - coins,badges,beermats and keyrings. Lots of people had hobbies because they had retired,others because they liked doing it. One man did martial arts,another bowled, some had children thattook up their time. One man said he climbed because it was daring. A woman said she was still trying to get used to her retirement.
